name: Running Riot - 5min Demo
description:
Running Riot is a top-down arena shooter where you must blast hordes of enemies away with your high-tech weaponry and gadgets. Killing enemies gives you points and also drops an XP orb. Pick up enough XP orbs and you'll level up, gaining a powerful ability upgrade.

This is a demo for a game I'm hoping to release in a couple of months. Try to survive for 5 minutes, and score as many points as possible! Looking forward to hearing how you like it!

Controls

ESC - Pause Menu (not usable while upgrading)

WASD - Move around

LMB, RMB, Shift, Space - Use basic abilities. Basic abilities usually give you energy that powers your Ultimate.

R - Use ultimate ability. Only usable when you have acquired enough energy.
